Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Oxidative / nitrosative and neuroinflammatory parameters were estimated in the CPu and cingulate cortex ( Cg ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Oxidative stress |
| Nitrosative stress |
| Neuroinflammation |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Neuroinflammation |

[Note: Oxidative stress and nitrosative stress are not diseases per se, but rather conditions or processes that can contribute to various diseases. In this context, they are often associated with neurodegenerative diseases and other conditions, so they can be considered related to diseases.]
